entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 09:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this morning. Periods of snow over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
